targets.query: SELECT top(mean, server, "name", $TOP) FROM (SELECT mean("value") FROM "ipmi_sensor" WHERE role != 'cube' AND unit = 'degrees_c' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "server", "name")
SELECT top(mean, server, "name", $TOP) FROM (SELECT mean("value") FROM "ipmi_sensor" WHERE role != 'cube' AND unit = 'watts' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "server", "name")
SELECT top(last, "host", $TOP) FROM (SELECT last("uptime") FROM "system" WHERE role != 'cube' AND ("host" =~ /^$HOSTS$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")
SELECT top(mean, "host", $TOP) FROM (SELECT mean("usage_idle") * -1 + 100 FROM "cpu" WHERE role != 'cube' AND ("host" =~ /^$HOSTS$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")
SELECT top(mean, "host", $TOP) FROM (SELECT mean("usage_idle") * -1 + 100 FROM "cpu" WHERE role != 'cube' AND ("host" =~ /^$HOSTS$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")
SELECT top(mean, "path","host", $TOP) FROM (SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE role != 'cube' AND "host" =~ /^$HOSTS$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "path")

SELECT top(mean, $TOP), "name", "host" FROM (SELECT mean(non_negative_derivative) FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative("write_bytes", 1s) FROM "diskio" WHERE role != 'cube' AND "host" =~ /^$HOSTS$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "name") GROUP BY "host", "name")

SELECT top(mean, $TOP), "name", "host" FROM (SELECT mean(non_negative_derivative) FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative("read_bytes", 1s) FROM "diskio" WHERE role != 'cube' AND "host" =~ /^$HOSTS$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "name") GROUP BY "host", "name")

SELECT top(mean, $TOP), "name", "host" FROM (SELECT mean(non_negative_derivative) FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative("writes", 1s) FROM "diskio" WHERE role != 'cube' AND "host" =~ /^$HOSTS$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "name") GROUP BY "host", "name")

SELECT top(mean, $TOP), "name", "host" FROM (SELECT mean(non_negative_derivative) FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative("reads", 1s) FROM "diskio" WHERE role != 'cube' AND "host" =~ /^$HOSTS$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "name") GROUP BY "host", "name")

SELECT top(mean, $TOP), "name", "host" FROM (SELECT mean("latency") FROM (SELECT non_negative_difference("write_time") / non_negative_difference("writes") AS "latency" FROM "diskio" WHERE role != 'cube' AND "host" =~ /^$HOSTS$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "name") GROUP BY "host", "name")

SELECT top(mean, $TOP), "name", "host" FROM (SELECT mean("latency") FROM (SELECT non_negative_difference("read_time") / non_negative_difference("reads") AS "latency" FROM "diskio" WHERE role != 'cube' AND "host" =~ /^$HOSTS$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "name") GROUP BY "host", "name")

SELECT top(mean, $TOP), "interface", "host" FROM (SELECT mean(non_negative_derivative) FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative("bytes_recv", 1s) FROM "net" WHERE role != 'cube' AND "host" =~ /^$HOSTS$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "interface") GROUP BY "host", "interface")

SELECT top(mean, $TOP), "interface", "host" FROM (SELECT mean(non_negative_derivative) FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative("bytes_sent", 1s) FROM "net" WHERE role != 'cube' AND "host" =~ /^$HOSTS$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "interface") GROUP BY "host", "interface")

SELECT top(mean, $TOP), "interface", "host" FROM (SELECT mean(non_negative_derivative) FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative("packets_recv", 1s) FROM "net" WHERE role != 'cube' AND "host" =~ /^$HOSTS$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "interface") GROUP BY "host", "interface")

SELECT top(mean, $TOP), "interface", "host" FROM (SELECT mean(non_negative_derivative) FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative("packets_sent", 1s) FROM "net" WHERE role != 'cube' AND "host" =~ /^$HOSTS$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "interface") GROUP BY "host", "interface")

SELECT top(sum, $TOP), "interface", "host" FROM (SELECT sum(non_negative_difference) FROM (SELECT non_negative_difference("drop_in") FROM "net" WHERE role != 'cube' AND "host" =~ /^$HOSTS$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "interface") GROUP BY "host", "interface")

SELECT top(sum, $TOP), "interface", "host" FROM (SELECT sum(non_negative_difference) FROM (SELECT non_negative_difference("drop_out") FROM "net" WHERE role != 'cube' AND "host" =~ /^$HOSTS$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "interface") GROUP BY "host", "interface")

SELECT top(sum, $TOP), "interface", "host" FROM (SELECT sum(non_negative_difference) FROM (SELECT non_negative_difference("err_in") FROM "net" WHERE role != 'cube' AND "host" =~ /^$HOSTS$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "interface") GROUP BY "host", "interface")

SELECT top(sum, $TOP), "interface", "host" FROM (SELECT sum(non_negative_difference) FROM (SELECT non_negative_difference("err_out") FROM "net" WHERE role != 'cube' AND "host" =~ /^$HOSTS$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "interface") GROUP BY "host", "interface")

list.label: Host(s)
list.name: HOSTS
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "host" WHERE role != 'cube'
